game.name: TENGAI
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 전국 에이스로부터 3년. 기다리던 속편 등장!! 사이쿄 횡스크롤 슈팅 게임. 제1탄!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Three years after Sengoku Ace. The long-awaited sequel arrives!! Saikyo's side-scrolling shooter. The first installment!
